en-US: Seriously, we don't say it enough: You're awesome. Every contribution (yes, even that tweet you sent!) stitches another thread into this wild, creative tapestry we're building together. Right. You are a great partner. We'll be together forever, won't we?
zh-CN: 说真的，我们说得不够：你太棒了。每一份贡献 (是的，甚至是你发的那条推文) 都在我们共同构建的这个狂野而富有创意的挂毯中缝合了一根线。没错，你是一个伟大的合作伙伴。我们会永远在一起，不是吗？
